posts.content:
Hi everyone ! Happy Holidays !

I posted briefly on the Blood and Faith build thread. But I don’t wanna clog it up.

Reading the cleric guide (which is awesome) made me want to play a cleric. Been looking at all the ways they can be built. I feel like I wanna go Str. There is obviously the Mith’s blood and Faith build (mith-s-blood-and-faith-cleric-26-bard-4 ... 15481.html) .
I also found Mick’s Devastator build (devastator-priest-cleric-26-monk-4-cot-10-t2355164.html). Right now I’m leaning towards Mick’s build just because I feel like getting the multiclasses earlier probly makes it more fun to play. Also I like the two weapon focus. I looked at most of the cleric builds in the level 40 section but maybe I missed some. These two were the str ones that I noticed. Some really cool dex based ones but I currently have an SoU playthrough with a dex based invisy type build (not cleric though).

I am either gonna play it through OC + mines of the twin summit. Or …. Swordflight. But I feel like I want some rogue skills/ persuade skills for swordflihht so not sure it fits.

Any suggestions are welcomed.

I have a question about Darkfire. Just got it on a char. The tooltip makes it seem like it can only be applied to mundane weapons ? Like a +1 weap wouldnt work?
Also it says the weapon becomes 1d6 dmg. Does that mean a 1d8 weapon will become 1d6? Am I reading this wrong ?

Ty in advance :)

posts.author: Vinleboiteux
posts.content: Just reread the tool tip for darkfire. You can ignore my question now :)
